name: NimbleBooks

”Alexa, what's my Flash Briefing?”

skdetail:
Flash Briefing Skill
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
Developer Terms of Use
des:
Nimble Books publishes books on military & naval history, politics, international affairs, popular culture, and more. Each hourly feed update includes an informational update, an excerpt from one of Nimble's 300 books in print, and three popular tweets from Nimble's network of thought leaders. 

Nimble authors on national security and strategy include Michael Tanji, Mark Safranski (Zenpundit), Dr. Nancy Snow (drpersuasion), and David Axe (daxe).

Nimble naval history writers include Richard Worth, Hans Lengerer and Lars Ahlberg, and Robert Lundgren.

Nimble technology authors include Peter Jones, Jon Watson, and Tom Myers.
priv:
Developer Privacy Policy
The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
